document_data.caption: A map showing Leechhome in northern Gnarhelm.
document_data.name: Leechhome
document_data.mainbody: '''Leechhome''' was a swamp located in the northern region of the kingdom of [[Gnarhelm]] on the island of [[Alaron]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: Leechhome was found between two freshwater lakesâ€“the [[Lake of the Leech]] in the north, and [[Lac Sielya]] in the south. The swamp was approximately {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} from the shore of the [[Sea of Swords]]. The swamp covered roughly {{SI|50|sq mi|k}}.
